channel.title: Server sharing?
channel.description: Hello. I am a noob here and need to learn how to make my server that is running on my comp accessable from the internet via moparisthebest.com. I have a no-ip and a hamachi account but dont know how to use them. See where this becomes a problem? So anyone who can help me will have my gratitude.

item.title: Server sharing?

item.description:
@metalus89 wrote:

Hello. I am a noob here and need to learn how to make my server that is running on my comp accessable from the internet via moparisthebest.com. I have a no-ip and a hamachi account but dont know how to use them. See where this becomes a problem?
So anyone who can help me will have my gratitude.
